title: Salamander
summaries: Salamander is an enemy found in the Cavern layer. It has nine color variants that all share identical stats and behavior. Salamander can spit projectiles that inflict the Poisoned debuff.

Salamanders are unique in that their ability to spawn is connected to two other enemies: the <linked>Crawdad</linked> and the <linked>Giant Shelly</linked>. Of these three enemies, a world will choose two types that it can spawn, leaving the third inaccessible. Salamanders will never spawn in a world that features both Crawdads and Giant Shellies together. This is taken into account by the <linked>Bestiary</linked> progression logic (the missing enemy will register as unlocked when the other two exclusive creatures are unlocked) and the <linked>banner</linked> acquisition (any two of the trio's banners can be used to craft the banner of the missing member of the trio).
